lead_paragraph: Rex Ryan's inability to back up his boasts of building a bully — particularly on defense — in Buffalo led to the Bills firing their high-profile coach one game short of completing his second full season.

headline.print_headline: Bills Fire Coach Rex Ryan Ahead of Last Game of Season
headline.main: Bills Fire Coach Rex Ryan Ahead of Last Game of Season
